Caption: (From Left) Mr. C.V. Sethunathan greets Mr. Akbar Alikhan, Dr. Raja Sir Muthiah Chettiar, Dr. A.L. Mudaliar and Mr. M.C. Chagla
Description: Mr. M. C. Chagla was visiting IIT Madras for the first time, and was highly impressed by the Institute and its professors. Mr. C.V. Sethunathan succeeded Mr. R. Natarajan as the Registrar of IIT Madras. Mrs. Shanti Sengupto, wife of Prof. B. Sengupto is also seen (Next to Dr. A. L. Mudaliar).
